ItemTooltips.quelling_blade: Helps you last hit and farm jungle.
ItemTooltips.slippers: Gives you some more early damage.
ItemTooltips.boots: Every hero needs boots to run faster.
ItemTooltips.flask: Good heal when you are low.
ItemTooltips.phase_boots: Allows you to move through units while spinning as well as giving you some more damage.
ItemTooltips.poor_mans_shield: Makes you take less damage from harass.
ItemTooltips.vladmir: Gives you a good aura and lifesteal.
ItemTooltips.ultimate_scepter: Get this if your team has another carry and you need more magic damage.
ItemTooltips.black_king_bar: Get this if getting stunned is a problem.
ItemTooltips.butterfly: Gives tons of DPS and evasion.
ItemTooltips.bfury: Get this if you will be farming and pushing a lot.
ItemTooltips.manta: Illusions give you more damage and add some confusion.
ItemTooltips.mjollnir: This will make you attack very fast and push well.
ItemTooltips.desolator: Allows you to hit a lot harder.
ItemTooltips.yasha: A good DPS item and makes you run faster.
ItemTooltips.abyssal_blade: Get this if you need a stun.

AbilityTooltips.juggernaut_blade_fury: Does tons of damage early use it to get kills. Later on it will allow you to run since you are magic immune while spinning.
AbilityTooltips.juggernaut_healing_ward: One level gives enough heal for a while, use this to heal up the team.
AbilityTooltips.juggernaut_blade_dance: Not needed in lane so get this later once team fights start happening.
AbilityTooltips.juggernaut_omni_slash: This can kill heroes solo very well. Use it to start team fights or to kill heroes that you meet 1v1.
AbilityTooltips.attribute_bonus: Early levels of stats will allow you do more damage have more health and, give you enough Mana to use both Blade Fury and Omnislash at level 6.
